# Groups Theme Layout

The groups theme layout displays all the groups for your church and can include a form for users who need help finding a group suitable for them.

## Import the Groups Theme Layout

As we continue to develop Digital Church, we are updating our theme layouts regularly. In order to have the latest theme layout, however, you will need to manually import the theme layout into your website. You can download the latest theme layout below:

<a target="_blank" href={ require("/downloads/theme-layout-groups.zip").default } download>Download the Groups Theme Layout</a>
